channel.title: Giovanni Marigi - Personal Page
channel.description: Recent content on Giovanni Marigi - Personal Page

item.title: The importance of reading books
item.description: At the basis of a simple and natural understanding of oneself, which is I believe the definition of happiness (albeit intermittently), is the discovery of what is not so obvious through reading.

I am a guy (and always will be in spirit) over 40 who works as a Solutions Architects in the IT sector. I studied Computer Engineering and my background is humanistic and the subjects studied during my high school years have remained my passions as can be seen in this website. In addition to literature, the study of history, art and music, I have a great passion for sport in general and mainly follow and practice mountain biking, trekking, tennis and basketball.
